rooms.name: The Harmony Room
rooms.description: Experience ultimate comfort in the Harmony Suite, featuring elegant décor, spacious living areas, and modern amenities for a serene, luxurious getaway.

rooms.name: The Solace Room
rooms.description: Unwind in the Serenity Suite, designed for peaceful escapes with calming interiors, private balcony views, and premium amenities for total relaxation.

rooms.name: The Lovers' Suite
rooms.description: Celebrate romance in the Lovers Suite, offering intimate spaces, cozy luxury, and breathtaking views—perfect for couples seeking an unforgettable retreat.

rooms.name: The Mountain Room
rooms.description: Stay close to nature in our Mountain Hostel Room, with rustic charm, essential comforts, and panoramic mountain views for adventurous travelers.

rooms.name: The River Room
rooms.description: Relax in the River Hostel Room, offering cozy simplicity, essential comforts, and easy access to scenic trails and outdoor adventures for budget-friendly travelers.

rooms.name: The Campground
rooms.description: Reconnect with nature at our Campground, offering spacious sites, fire pits, and modern facilities for an authentic outdoor experience under the stars.
